content: Take this <style=Highlight>Blueprint: Cozy Feast</style>. It includes several decorations you'll need to host a feast of your own.
info: 美味餐厅1-莫白_主流程文本3

content: {A抱歉}Ah, one moment please! I see your cooking skills have improved. Perhaps you'd like to try hosting a Cozy Feast!
info: 美味餐厅1-莫白_主流程文本3

content: Why not try <style=Highlight>hosting a Cozy Feast</style> with the <style=Highlight>blueprint</style>? If you have any questions, you can always come see me here at the Camp, hoho~!

content: {A挠头}At the feast, you can showcase your best dishes and invite others to enjoy them and share their thoughts.
